entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Grand Bank
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:21 PM NST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 04:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 93 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: 45 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow ending overnight then cloudy. Blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Clearing. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023
